groupSPV.model

Class CustomKit

  • java.lang.Object
    • groupSPV.model.CustomKit

  • public class CustomKit
extends java.lang.Object
    CustomKit is a "Facade" class to the bitcoinj WalletAppKit class. It simplifies working with the WalletAppKit class for our specific project needs.
    Author:
    Frank Fasola, James Donnell, Spencer Escalante, Trevor Silva

    • Constructor Detail

      • CustomKit

        public CustomKit(java.io.File saveLocation)
        Constructor for creating a CustomKit at a particular saveLocation. Uses default bitcoin network.
        Parameters:
        saveLocation - File object of folder location to save client files.

      • CustomKit

        public CustomKit(int network,
                 java.io.File saveLocation)
        Constructor for creating a CustomKit at a particular saveLocation. Uses network ints. TestNet if 1, MainNet if anything else.
        Parameters:
        network - Network selection integer.
        saveLocation - File object of folder location to save client files.

      • getFullBlock

        protected org.bitcoinj.core.Block getFullBlock(org.bitcoinj.core.Peer peer,
                                               org.bitcoinj.core.Sha256Hash blockHash)
                                        throws java.lang.InterruptedException,
                                               java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException
        Requests and returns a full Block from supplied Peer.
        Parameters:
        peer - Full peer to request Block from.
        blockHash - Block hash to request.
        Returns:
        Full block.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - Thrown if interrupted.
        java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException - Thrown if error arises.

      • getFullBlock

        public org.bitcoinj.core.Block getFullBlock(org.bitcoinj.core.Sha256Hash blockHash)
                                     throws java.lang.InterruptedException,
                                            java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException
        Requests and returns a full Block from Peer from getConnectedPeer().
        Parameters:
        blockHash - Block hash to request.
        Returns:
        Full block.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - Thrown if interrupted.
        java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException - Thrown if error arises.
